scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && tsc && cp ./src/package.json ./build/src/package.json && cd ./build/src && npm i && rm -rf ./node_modules/.bin
scripts.cdk:diff: npm run cdk:synth && cdk diff --app 'node build/infrastructure/index.js'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cdk deploy --app 'node build/infrastructure/index.js' xxx-greeter-service --output 'build/cdk.out' --strict
scripts.cdk:synth: npm run build && cdk synth --app 'node build/infrastructure/index.js' --output 'build/cdk.out' --strict
